original: gu gul ser po dang / pha wam gi rtug pa kun la bsku ba'i rtug pa sbyar ba'i du bas bdugs na 'go ba'i nad pa'i gan du phyin yang mi tshugs /
analyzed: gu gul ser po dang / pha wam gi rtug pa kun la bsku ba'i rtug pa sbyar ba'i du bas bdugs na 'go ba'i nad pa'i gan du phyin yang mi tshugs /
translated: If one fumigates with the smoke of a compound of yellow gugul, bezoar, and all-smelling dung, even if one goes near a patient with a contagious disease, one will not be affected.

original: gos pa la thug na myur du sel /
